CloudVendor.description:
A list of cloud vendors.
The purpose of defining them is to regulate their names throughout the framework and all packages.
CloudVendor.title: CloudVendor

ComponentType.description: Interface that represents a typing classification for components.
ComponentType.title: ComponentType

ComponentsInfo.description: Interface that represents information about available component constructs.

types.description: Available types and subtypes for components, keyed by a unique identifier among all components/services/relations.
types.title: types

ComponentsInfo.title: ComponentsInfo

ConstructsInfo.description:
Interface that represents information about custom (code blocks) construct.
Most notably it includes a reference to the code template.

custom.description:
Information about optional custom (code blocks).
Missing this field implies that the package does NOT support custom code blocks.
custom.title: custom

network.description:
Information about optional network.
Missing this field implies that the package does NOT support customisable virtual network.
network.title: network

schema.description: The reference to the json schema file for creating a valid json config when using the package.
schema.title: schema

ConstructsInfo.title: ConstructsInfo

CustomInfo.description:
Interface that represents information about custom (code blocks) construct.
Most notably it includes a reference to the code template.

template.description: The reference to the code template file for creating a valid custom code block when using the package.
template.title: template

CustomInfo.title: CustomInfo

NetworkInfo.description: Interface that represents information about network construct.
NetworkInfo.title: NetworkInfo

RelationType.description: Interface that represents a typing classification for relations.
RelationType.title: RelationType

RelationsInfo.description:
Interface that represents information about available relation constructs, keyed by a unique identifier among all components/services/relations.
It relies on the typing definitions in both {@link ComponentInfo} and {@link ServicesInfo}.

types.description:
Available relations between a specific component/service and another component/service.
Both the `start` and `finish` points here refer to the keys defined in `components` and `services` fields.
types.title: types

RelationsInfo.title: RelationsInfo

ServiceType.description:
Interface that represents a typing classification for services.
In particular, it contains a field for deployment instructions for the type of services defined.

deployment.description:
The deployment instructions.
This is normally in plain text; markdown can be used too.
deployment.title: deployment

ServiceType.title: ServiceType

ServicesInfo.description: Interface that represents information about available service constructs.

types.description: Available types and subtypes for services, keyed by a unique identifier among all components/services/relations.
types.title: types

ServicesInfo.title: ServicesInfo

SupportInfo.description: Interface that offers support information about the package.

email.description: The support email address of the package.
email.title: email

phone.description: The support phone number of the package.
phone.title: phone

url.description: The URL to the support site of the package.
url.title: url

SupportInfo.title: SupportInfo

ToolingInfo.description: Interface that offers information about IaC tooling.

command.description: The shell command to run deployment with the package.
command.title: command

vendors.description:
The supported cloud vendors.
Usually a package chooses support one vendor but some choose to have multiple-vendor support.
vendors.title: vendors

ToolingInfo.title: ToolingInfo

ToolingLanguage.description:
A list of IaC languages.
The purpose of defining them is to regulate their names throughout the framework and all packages.
ToolingLanguage.title: ToolingLanguage

ToolingRuntime.description:
A list of IaC runtime.
The purpose of defining them is to regulate their names throughout the framework and all packages.
ToolingRuntime.title: ToolingRuntime

description:
Interface for modelling a package manifest json file that provides informations about the package.
Crucially it also carries two references respectively to a) a json schema file for validating json config files and b) a template file for custom code blocks.

cdf.description: The version of OpenFABR CDF that this package is compatible with, following semantic versioning.
cdf.title: cdf

constructs.description: Information about constructs defined in the package.
constructs.title: constructs

identifier.description: The unique identifier of the package.
identifier.title: identifier

license.description: The SPDX license identifier for the license that the package is released under.
license.title: license

name.description: The descriptive name of the package.
name.title: name

support.description: Information about the support provided for the package.
support.title: support

tooling.description: Information about tooling the package relies on.
tooling.title: tooling
